medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 week ago and progressively worsened.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Family history of hereditary hemorrhagic telangiectasia with past diagnosis of pulmonary arteriovenous fistulas (PAVFs), multiple gastrointestinal bleeds, mild to moderate nosebleeds, and a minor cerebral stroke.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of hereditary hemorrhagic telangiectasia manifesting as telangiectasia of the gastrointestinal tract and nasal mucosa.
